overview: In the swinging sixties three girls discover they have the same boyfriend who has been playing around with them all while vowing fidelity to each. To teach him a lesson he won't forget, the trio contrive to lock him up and continually favour him with their attentions in turn.
tagline: Some men are starved for love... Paxton Quigley's problem was completely the opposite!
title: Three in the Attic
